desc: 8-Track Music is all about creating music in 8 tracks or less. The focus is on building great sample content for producers and beat makers as they go on their musical journey. Whether content creator, audiophile or podcaster we got you covered.

layout.text: 8-Track Music is all about beat making community. The lifestyle and creativity we represent. Our methods for making music and expressing what we enjoy in this community. Oh and we design things enjoy!
